title: Multi Interact
longDescription:

Preview Video

---------------------------

Documentation


Multi Interaction Plugin - Beta Version

Welcome to the Multi Interaction plugin, designed to expand the interaction capabilities within your Unreal Engine projects. Please note that this plugin is currently in its Beta version, with ongoing updates and improvements planned for the future.


Feedback and Suggestions:

We value your feedback! Feel free to share your thoughts, suggestions, and any issues you encounter. Your input plays a crucial role in shaping the future updates and enhancements of the plugin.


Key Features:

  • InteractConstrComp: A versatile constructor for actors, enabling seamless interaction with your character.
  • InteractAnimComp: This component, when added to your character, facilitates interaction with actors equipped with InteractConstrComp.


Versatile Interactions:

  • Sitting Functionality: Allow your player character to transition from standing to sitting in a wide array of chairs, couches, benches, and stools.
  • Sleep Position: Achieve a realistic sleep position for beds, providing a seamless waking-up experience.
  • Door Handling: Open and close doors with various handles, offering multiple ways to enter and exit. (Note: Adjust the zone to prevent door clipping into the character.)
  • Additional Interactions: Expand the range of interactions by incorporating features such as opening latches and rotating steering wheels. This enhances the overall gameplay experience, adding depth to the character's engagement with the environment.


Animation Highlights:

Unlock dynamic interactions with the Multi Interaction plugin, featuring 32 curated animations. Note: While some animations are examples, all are integral to the plugin. For additional animations, users can explore the MultiAnim - Rest package or other creators' offerings to complement their projects seamlessly. This ensures flexibility and scalability in animation choices, aligning with diverse creative visions.


Procedural Enhancements:

  • Dynamic Rotation: Experience procedural rotation, adapting seamlessly to the interaction with objects such as chairs, ensuring a natural and immersive experience.
  • Adaptive Object Elevation: Say goodbye to static object heights. The plugin introduces procedural elevation adjustments, ensuring realistic interactions with objects of varying heights.
  • IK for Hands and Feet: Achieve a higher level of realism with Inverse Kinematics for hands and feet, ensuring accurate positioning during interactions.


Motion Warping Integration:

The Multi Interaction plugin leverages the embedded Motion Warping plugin, providing unparalleled control over animations and objects. Immerse yourself in a world of dynamic animations and precise object interactions for a truly engaging experience.


Actor Templates:

Explore 24 actor templates included in the plugin, showcasing the endless possibilities of interaction. This serves as a starting point, with more examples and templates planned for future updates. Expect additions for interacting with objects such as cars, motorcycles, and more.


C++ And BP:

The plugin includes a single C++ file, FunctionLibrary.


Embark on a journey of interactive possibilities with the Multi Interaction plugin. Elevate your gaming experience by incorporating a wide range of animations and interactions seamlessly into your Unreal Engine projects. Explore the endless potential of this versatile tool, and stay tuned for exciting updates in future releases.
